name: bj-evaleq

stmt.origin: 3eqtr4g(cslot(c0), cslot(c1), cmpt(hs0, universe, cfv(cv(hs0), c0)), cmpt(hs0, universe, cfv(cv(hs0), c1)), wceq(c0, c1))
stmt.pretty: 3eqtr4g(Slot(c0), Slot(c1), (hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs0 ` c0)), (hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs0 ` c1)), c0 = c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cslot(c0), cslot(c1)))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cmpt(hs0, universe, cfv(cv(hs0), c0)), cmpt(hs0, universe, cfv(cv(hs0), c1))))
-| wceq(cslot(c0), cmpt(hs0, universe, cfv(cv(hs0), c0)))
-| wceq(cslot(c1), cmpt(hs0, universe, cfv(cv(hs0), c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 = c1 → Slot(c0)= Slot(c1))
⊣ (c0 = c1 →(hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs0 ` c0))=(hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs0 ` c1)))
⊣ Slot(c0)=(hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs0 ` c0))
⊣ Slot(c1)=(hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs0 ` c1))

comment: Equality theorem for the ` Slot ` construction. This is currently a duplicate of ~ sloteq but may diverge from it if/when a token Eval is introduced for evaluation in order to separate it from Slot and any of its possible modifications. (Contributed by BJ, 27-Dec-2021.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
